title: 3-Point Products Oval-8 Finger Splint Size 5 (Pack of 1)
feature: Can be worn up to 6 different ways to treat swan neck deformity, boutonniere deformity
Each splint fits both a whole and a half size depending on which end is applied first
Can be used in case of mallet finger, trigger finger, lateral deviation and immobilization
